definition: spray/ocean spray/spindrift/fig. happenings from one's life/CL:朵[duo3]
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: The sea spry stings all their cuts and bruises.
sentences.chinese: 飛濺的浪花灼痛了他們的傷口和腫處。

sentences.english: We could hear across a little strip of land the pounding of the surf.
sentences.chinese: 一小條狹長陸地那邊傳來浪花拍岸的聲音。

sentences.english: The sea water foams under the bow.
sentences.chinese: 海水在船首下面泛起浪花。

sentences.english: I could see the waves boiling white under her forefoot.
sentences.chinese: 我已經看到波浪在船的龍頭下翻滾的浪花。

sentences.english: And The flung Spray and the blown spume, and the sea-gulls crying.
sentences.chinese: 還有翻滾的浪花，鼓脹的泡沫，以及海鷗的啼叫。

sentences.english: Suddenly, I come to spray, I Lai Buji run away.
sentences.chinese: 忽然間，浪花向我湧來，我來不急跑開。

sentences.english: Dark green swells, slate-gray in the troughs, rolled in from a heaving horizon.
sentences.chinese: 一排排暗綠色的大浪帶着灰白的浪花從遠處滾滾而來。

sentences.english: East billowing Yangtze River passes the water, the spray inundates the completely heros.
sentences.chinese: 滾滾長江東逝水，浪花滔盡英雄。

sentences.english: Being still, it lets us to look deeply into the interbeing of water and waves.
sentences.chinese: 靜止下來，讓您我深觀浪花與海水的相即。

sentences.english: Face countless different nature of the aquarium will vary with the spray transfer or long stay.
sentences.chinese: 無數面貌不同性情各異的水族便隨着浪花遷移或長留。

sentences.english: Thee sea surges up with laughter, and pale gleams the smile of the sea-beach.
sentences.chinese: 大海歡笑着翻騰浪花，而海灘的微笑泛着暗淡的光。

sentences.english: Waves break helplessly against the boat each side.
sentences.chinese: 浪花無助地粉碎在兩邊船舷。

sentences.english: Waves broke white into the flowers.
sentences.chinese: 浪峯撞擊着迸出花朵似的雪白的浪花。

sentences.english: The sea surges up with laughter, and pale gleams the smile of the sea-beach.
sentences.chinese: 大海歡笑着翻騰浪花，而海灘的微笑泛着暗淡的光。

sentences.english: Rolling in the Yangtze River winter, spray hero.
sentences.chinese: 滾滾長江冬逝水，浪花淘盡英雄。

sentences.english: Six bottlenose dolphins were leaping in and out of the water, stirring up whitecaps.
sentences.chinese: 六隻寬吻海豚正在水中跳躍嬉戲，激起白色的浪花。

definition: to beat against the shore (of waves)
